name: Venus Protocol
description: Venus is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform on the Binance Smart Chain that allows users to lend, borrow, and earn interest on their crypto assets.

name: Autoshark
description: AutoShark Finance is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform on the Binance Smart Chain that offers services such as yield farming, staking, and automated market making (AMM).

name: PancakeSwap
description: PancakeSwap is a decentralized exchange (DEX) on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) that allows users to swap BEP-20 tokens. It features yield farming, staking, and a lottery system, providing users with opportunities to earn rewards through liquidity provision and participation in various financial activities.

name: Apeswap
description: ApeSwap is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform on the Binance Smart Chain that provides services such as token swapping, yield farming, and staking. It aims to offer a user-friendly experience with a focus on community-driven development and sustainability.

name: Usdfi
description: USDFI is a decentralized finance (DeFi) platform focused on providing stablecoin solutions.

name: Organya World
description: Organya World is an online gaming platform where players can engage in various interactive activities.
